entries.title: Microsoft Bets Big on the Creator of ChatGPT in Race to Dominate A.I.
entries.description: As a new chatbot wows the world with its conversational talents, a resurgent tech giant is poised to reap the benefits while doubling down on a relationship with the start-up OpenAI.

entries.title: S.E.C. Charges Crypto Companies With Offering Unregistered Securities
entries.description: The S.E.C. charged Genesis Global Capital and Gemini Trust, which is run by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, as crypto companies face heightened regulatory scrutiny.

entries.title: SEC Charges Crypto Companies With Offering Unregistered Securities
entries.description: The S.E.C. charged Genesis Global Capital and Gemini Trust, which is run by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, as crypto companies face heightened regulatory scrutiny.

entries.title: Don’t Ban ChatGPT in Schools. Teach With It.
entries.description: OpenAI’s new chat bot is raising fears of cheating on homework, but its potential as an educational tool outweighs its risks.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Makes First Detailed Response to Fraud Charges
entries.description: The disgraced founder of the crypto exchange FTX denied that he stole anyone’s money and said customers could still get their deposits back.

entries.title: Amazon Loses Bid to Overturn Union Victory at Staten Island Warehouse
entries.description: A National Labor Relations Board official found a lack of evidence to support claims of election improprieties. Amazon could appeal the decision.
